SEARCH
Package photos24

Class AddPhotoController

java.lang.Object
photos24.AddPhotoController
public class AddPhotoController extends Object
Controller class for adding photos to an album in the Photos24 application. This class uses the default constructor.

  • Constructor Details

    • AddPhotoController

      public AddPhotoController()

  • Method Details

    • setCurrentAlbum

      public void setCurrentAlbum(Album album)
      Sets the current album to which photos will be added.
      Parameters:
      album - The album to be set as the current album.

    • handleChoosePhotos

      private void handleChoosePhotos()
      Handles the action of choosing photos from the file system. Opens a file chooser dialog to select multiple image files.

    • displayPhoto

      private void displayPhoto(int index)
      Displays the photo at the specified index in the imageView.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the photo to be displayed.

    • handlePreviousPhoto

      private void handlePreviousPhoto()
      Handles the action to view the previous photo in the list of selected photos. Decrements the current photo index and updates the view.

    • handleNextPhoto

      private void handleNextPhoto()
      Handles the action to view the next photo in the list of selected photos. Increments the current photo index and updates the view.

    • updateButtons

      private void updateButtons()
      Updates the state of navigation buttons based on the current index of the photo being displayed.

    • handleAddPhotos

      private void handleAddPhotos()
      Handles the action of adding the selected photos to the current album. Adds existing pictures from the library or new ones from the selected files.

    • closeStage

      private void closeStage()
      Closes the current stage (window) after serialization of users. This method is called after adding photos to the album.
